title: Publications
text:

Yang L, Pan L, Qin H, Zhang L. Research progress of hypoxia-induced HIF-1 in pathological scars. Chinese Journal of Aesthetic Plastic Surgery. 2021;32(07):427-430.

title: Lingfeng Pan
text:
教育背景

2023.09-至今：慕尼黑工业大学（Technical University of Munich），Department of Plastic and Hand Surgery, Klinikum Rechts der Isar，博士研究生
2020.09-2023.07：吉林大学白求恩第三医院，整形外科专业型医学硕士
2015.09-2020.07：吉林大学临床医学5+3，白求恩临床医学部医学学士

title: Lingfeng Pan
text:
研究方向

整形外科再生医学：PRP、HPS 等自体生物制剂
毛发疾病与皮肤疾病的生物信息学与 GWAS 研究
创面修复与瘢痕形成机制

title: Lingfeng Pan
text:
个人优势

具备“临床-实验-数据分析”一体化训练背景，能够从临床问题出发设计基础与转化研究。
同时推进整形外科临床学习与科研产出，研究主题持续聚焦毛发与再生医学方向。
可独立开展系统综述、Mendelian randomization、GWAS 与实验研究的协同分析，兼顾机制探索与临床可转化性。

title: Lingfeng Pan
text:
科研与临床经历

2025.10-至今：慕尼黑工业大学 Klinikum Rechts der Isar 整形外科，住院医师临床学习
重点学习巨乳缩小、腹壁整形、脂肪移植等手术。参与临床研究：1）巨乳缩小术中不同包膜切除方式的并发症比较；2）预防性静脉注射氨甲环酸对腹部整形术围手术期效果的影响。
2025.04-2026：慕尼黑工业大学 Klinikum Rechts der Isar，毛发疾病生物信息学与 GWAS 研究
围绕雄激素性脱发与斑秃开展多组学整合与遗传关联分析，推进候选通路与潜在干预靶点筛选。
2024.05-2025.10：慕尼黑工业大学 Klinikum Rechts der Isar 整形外科实验室
开展缺氧诱导血清（HPS）与富血小板血浆（PRP）疗效对比研究，探索 HPS 在再生医学中的应用场景与转化路径。
2023.10-2024.06：Helmholtz Munich（亥姆霍兹慕尼黑研究中心）
接受生物信息学与全基因组关联研究（GWAS）科研训练，建立遗传流行病学分析与结果解释能力。
2021.06-2023.06：吉林大学白求恩第三医院整形外科
开展富血小板血浆（PRP）治疗雄激素性脱发相关研究，积累毛发疾病临床与转化研究经验。
2021.01-2022.03：感染创面 PRP 水凝胶敷料研发
国家自然科学基金项目，吉林大学公共卫生学院放射生物学系。开发 PVA/PHMB/PRP 复合水凝胶敷料，兼具抗菌与促愈合效果，并在全层皮肤缺损感染模型中验证。
2019.09-2020.05：东北地区慢性病流行病学调查
国家重点研发计划，吉林大学公共卫生学院流行病与卫生统计学系。参与队列研究设计、现场数据采集与人群数据分析。
2018.01-2019.05：光老化皮肤中透明质酸表达变化研究
负责分子生物学实验与数据处理。

title: Lingfeng Pan
text:
技能

细胞培养：L929 细胞、皮肤成纤维细胞、瘢痕疙瘩细胞、HUVEC、BT549 等
表型检测：qPCR、Western blot、IHC、Masson、ELISA、流式细胞术
软件：Origin、GraphPad Prism、ImageJ、SPSS、Adobe Photoshop、Adobe Illustrator
英语：IELTS Academic 6.5

title: Lingfeng Pan
text:
lingfengpan@outlook.com
  
  
    
     Google Scholar
  
  
    
     ORCID
  

  
  
Doctoral candidate at the Technical University of Munich with a clinical medicine background and research experience in wound healing, skin biology, and translational dermatology. Current work also includes bioinformatics and GWAS research.



Technical University of Munich - Doctor Candidate (09/2023-Present)
Jilin University - Master Degree, Clinical Medicine (09/2020-07/2023)
Jilin University - Bachelor Degree, Clinical Medicine (09/2015-07/2020)





Hospitation training in Plastic Surgery, Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Technical University of Munich (10/2025-Present)
Focused on reduction mammoplasty, abdominoplasty, and fat grafting. Participating in clinical studies on: 1) complication rates across capsule excision techniques in breast reduction; 2) perioperative effects of prophylactic intravenous tranexamic acid in abdominoplasty.
Bioinformatics and GWAS research on androgenetic alopecia and alopecia areata, Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Technical University of Munich (04/2025-2026)
Conducting multi-omics integration and genetic association analyses to identify candidate pathways and potential therapeutic targets.
Comparative efficacy study of hypoxia-preconditioned serum (HPS) vs platelet-rich plasma (PRP), Plastic Surgery Laboratory, Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Technical University of Munich (05/2024-10/2025)
Evaluating HPS versus PRP and exploring translational applications of HPS in regenerative medicine.
Bioinformatics and GWAS research training, Helmholtz Munich (10/2023-06/2024)
Completed structured training in bioinformatics and genome-wide association analysis, with emphasis on genetic epidemiology workflows and interpretation.





Pan L, Li C, Moog P, Knoedler S, Kükrek H, Dornseifer U, Machens H-G, Jiang J. Large-Scale Plasma Proteomics and Genetic Integration Uncover Novel Biological Pathways in Male Pattern Baldness. International Journal of Molecular Sciences. 2026;27(4):2052. https://doi.org/10.3390/ijms27042052

title: Lingfeng Pan
text:
Technical University of Munich - Doctor Candidate (09/2023-Present)
Jilin University - Master Degree, Clinical Medicine (09/2020-07/2023)
Jilin University - Bachelor Degree, Clinical Medicine (09/2015-07/2020)

title: Lingfeng Pan
text:
Hospitation training in Plastic Surgery, Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Technical University of Munich (10/2025-Present)
Focused on reduction mammoplasty, abdominoplasty, and fat grafting. Participating in clinical studies on: 1) complication rates across capsule excision techniques in breast reduction; 2) perioperative effects of prophylactic intravenous tranexamic acid in abdominoplasty.
Bioinformatics and GWAS research on androgenetic alopecia and alopecia areata, Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Technical University of Munich (04/2025-2026)
Conducting multi-omics integration and genetic association analyses to identify candidate pathways and potential therapeutic targets.
Comparative efficacy study of hypoxia-preconditioned serum (HPS) vs platelet-rich plasma (PRP), Plastic Surgery Laboratory, Klinikum Rechts der Isar, Technical University of Munich (05/2024-10/2025)
Evaluating HPS versus PRP and exploring translational applications of HPS in regenerative medicine.
Bioinformatics and GWAS research training, Helmholtz Munich (10/2023-06/2024)
Completed structured training in bioinformatics and genome-wide association analysis, with emphasis on genetic epidemiology workflows and interpretation.

title: Lingfeng Pan Personal Website
text:
This repository contains the source code for Lingfeng Pan’s personal academic website. The site is built with Quarto and published via GitHub Pages.



URL: https://lingfeng2324.github.io
Repo: https://github.com/Lingfeng2324/Lingfeng2324.github.io





index.qmd: Home page
publications.qmd: Publications
Chinese.qmd: Chinese CV
about.qmd: About page





_quarto.yml: Site configuration (navigation, footer, output settings)
styles.scss: Website styles
images/: Image assets
docs/: Rendered static files for deployment




Run in project root:
quarto preview
This starts a local preview server with live reload.



quarto render
Quarto renders the website to docs/ (configured in _quarto.yml).



This repository deploys using GitHub Pages from the docs/ output. After updating content:

Edit .qmd files.
Run quarto render.
Commit and push changes.





Keep Chinese files in UTF-8 encoding to avoid garbled text.
Prefer editing source files (.qmd, _quarto.yml, styles.scss) instead of generated HTML in docs/.
